text.div:
RestfulSecurityService

Types of security services used with FHIR

This value set defines it's own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-security-service

CodeDisplayDefinition
OAuthOAuth (see oauth.net).
OAuth2OAuth version 2 (see oauth.net).
NTLMMicrosoft NTLM Authentication.
BasicBasic authentication defined in HTTP specification.
Kerberossee http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4120.txt.

description.value: Types of security services used with FHIR

definition.value: Basic authentication defined in HTTP specification.
